Very neat and travel lightly!

name: Julia
about:
I'm a Portland native who has had the good fortune to live in some other pretty cool cities for a time (Austin, NYC I'm looking at you) and some not so great ones (who shall remain nameless, they know who they are). I love my hometown and am happy others have caught Stumptown Fever.

I love my animal friends, am an enthusiastic coffee and tea drinker, and eat out a little more often than I probably should, but there are just so many good places to eat sometimes it's hard to resist...

name: Emily
about: After growing up in Tucson, Az I was ready for something new! Portland has brought me that and so much more!  For the past 8 years I have enjoyed exploring the world, but I am always happy to come home to Portland.

name: Bridget
about: Hi!  I am a transplant to Portland from the NY area and after almost ten years here I'm sold on the wonders of the west.  We like to get out to the woods, I like to read more than doing anything else at all.   But to be honest, the only thing that really matters in this case is that I really like having  a welcoming, colorful house.  And I love sharing it.  And I really love the idea of having our comfortable abode be appreciate by lots more people than just us.  Jeremy, our son and our daughter and I hope you like it.

name: Jenna
about: Hi!  My name is Jenna and I have lived in Portland for almost 10 years.  I love calling this city home - the food, the culture, and wonderful access to the outdoors.  I travel for work, and work in the environmental sector. What are you doing with this "one wild and precious life"?

name: Jennifer
about:
I am a wife and mother of one.  I enjoy riding my bike around town and along the river.  
I am a Real Estate Agent. I look forward to traveling with my family  before sending our son out into the world.  My favorite TV series is Gilmore Girls , my favorite movie has yet to be made.
The five things I couldn't live without would be: My pillow, water, peanut butter, fresh bread, and my hair ties.

name: Tara
about: I am a Portland native. I love this city and have lived in many areas, born in the Northwest. I love living in Northeast Portland in this 105 year old home. I am an avid gardener and enjoy design and creating spaces that are beautiful, functional and comfortable. I am an acupuncturist and business owner. I absolutely love the work I do. I I have a lot of variety in my business and ways to be creative and offer my time and ideas in the healing community. I love spending time in nature, Cascade snow, hiking, biking, eating out locally and taking trips to the coast!! Let me know if you need some tips on fun things to do locally!!

name: Jason
about: My name is Jason and I live in Portland, Oregon. I work at an organic grocery store, am an electronic musician, and an Interior Design student. I love donuts, cartoons, and coffee. The house I have listed on here is my in-laws. Its beautiful, you should spend the night. =P

name: Octavio
about: I'm a physician living in Portland, Oregon with my wife Dianna who is an environmentalist. We have active meditation and yoga practices.  We enjoy traveling and learning about other cultures.  Thank you!

name: Adam & Tracey
about:
Adam is a Portland area native and Tracey was drawn to Oregon from the east coast by graduate school and a love for all things outdoors.  

We're both life long travelers, live for new experiences, and enjoy meeting new people.  

We love Portland for its variety of food, music, and art culture and enjoy the outdoor spaces of the Northwest by hiking, backpacking, climbing, mountaineering, skiing/snowboarding, and cycling. 

Madison the cat was adopted from the mean streets of Eugene several years ago and enjoys tuna fish, catnip, napping, and hugs.  

We will be traveling in SE Asia from Oct 24th - Nov 24th and our lovely friend Drew will be house sitting and managing our rooms.

name: J & B
about: We are grateful to live in this beautiful city.  We have a home in the hills with our child and BIG dog.  Both of us are healthcare workers that are active in giving back to our community.  Come share our home with us!  We love hosting and meeting new people.  We've created some great friendships as a result of our time on Airbnb.

name: Beate
about: My husband and I have two teenage daughters. I am a German-born and spend my time with my friends, sewing, tango dancing and riding my bike all over town. I love my home and look forward to sharing with others.

name: Dessa
about:
I am a stay at home Mom of two beautiful girls ages 6 and 8. My husband of ten years is a project manager at Vigor Marine shipyard.  
Five things I can't live without: family, friends, good food, art, laughter.
My preferred style of traveling is by bike in Ireland!

name: Lela & Toren
about:
Lela is a songwriter by trade, and knows what it's like to be very far from home traveling all over the place to share her songs.  She sure can pack a suitcase.

Toren is a Marriage & Family Therapist, an avid surfer, and a fan of any bush/tree/shrub that bears fruit he can pick and eat.

When we are not on the road, we are at our lovely home in Portland.  We have a toddler daughter, and are quite busy as new parents.

As hosts, we can provide a tea cupboard full to the brim.  We are happy to tell you about our favorite restaurants and shops around the neighborhood & in greater Portland.  You'd be a good fit if you are looking for beautifully crafted locally made items, and if you love to eat at charming restaurants.

If you came to stay:
You could find a book by Richard Brautigan or Steinbeck on the shelves.
You could cook things in a cute kitchen.
You could listen to our vast record collection: Townes Van Zandt to Velvet Underground to Serge Gainsbourg to Neil Young to Fairport Convention to Grizzly Bear to Damien Jurado to MIA and on and on and on....
You could forage in the yard to edibles: blueberries, raspberries, peaches...etc.
You could walk to groceries, restaurants, breweries, coffee shops & parks!

name: Donald
about:
I'm a native of Canada and have lived in the US for 20 years, mostly in CA, and now 8 years in OR.  My home is located in Portland's east side near the Hawthorne neighborhood . My job is in IT, as a database developer and I do contract work mostly here in Portland.  I love to cook, and especially enjoy the outdoors, cycling and walking - camping! I have wide ranging interests and do plenty of yoga. Like to read especially poetry. Love travel and meeting people :-) I've lived in Spain, New Zealand, England for big chunks of my life.
As a guest I am quiet, respectful, and tidy. In the kitchen I clean as I go and leave things as I found them. In general I consider myself low impact in the ways that matter to a host.  As a homeowner, I have a pretty good sense about what your home means to you too.
I normally enjoy conversation,  but also respect other's space that way too. I look forward to meeting you!  Best, Donald

name: Camila
about:
We are an international “family” of 4 (Claus & Camila + our 2 cairn terriers girls, Jazz & Samba).

We moved to Portland in 2013 from Denmark (Claus is Danish and I’m from from Brazil, but lived in Denmark for 10 years). I work from home as a graphic/stationer designer and Claus works in the renewable energy industry.

We love to travel the world, but coming home is always a joy, specially because Portland is such a beautiful and vibrant city. It has it all, you name it! 

As hosts, we’ll do our best to provide a warm, beautiful and clean space for our guests and help them with recommendations when it comes to experiencing our city and its amazing surroundings!

We love being part of the AirBnb community!  We have been using AirBnb as guests for a few years now and enjoy being part of a local environment and try our best to experience the area as if we were locals!  We can't wait to provide the same service and experience to others as hosts...

name: Marico
about: I am a professional photographer and I love to travel as often as possible. Every time I go somewhere new I see differently and I meet incredible people. I look forward to sharing this adventure with you!

name: Andrea
about: I'm an east coast girl who moved here from Boston 6 years ago. Just climbed over that 50 mark, but still manage to get out to live shows and all the fun stuff Portland has to offer. I also spend time writing a screenplay, make funky crafts, adoring my cat. I love to cook and you cant keep me away from good yard sale, been running an art class with refugee kids for catholic charities - too cute!

name: James
about: Just a regular guy who is not savvy at crafting a good public profile, but I think you'll still like our house.

name: Shawna
about: A traveler of life.

name: Ryan
about:
Hello All,

A little about myself.  I am an avid traveler when work doesn't get in the way. I would define a successful trip as one where I was able to, if only for a moment, dissolve into another culture and feel as I was apart of a place that is not my own.  This feeling drives my sense of place and understanding of the big blue marble we all share. But enough of the philosophical me.  One of my passions is cooking and my international travels are often driven by my desire to go to great food cultures.  

I am a Landscape Architect by training, so I always weave interesting expressions in the built environment into my food driven itinerary.

My heritage is Irish and I am currently reading Oscar Wilde in honor of my next excursion, which is Dublin.

As for Travel, I appreciate the great wonders and attractions of the world, but my happiness lies in a small cafe or bar and in the side streets of the cities I visit.  I do strive to experience the culture of a place. I look forward to sharing an cocktail and your city!

Ryan

name: Nancy
about:
I am a Fine Artist and established my studio here in this Craftsman home
in 1990 where I have lived and worked ever since!! I moved to Portland in
 1985 from downtown Chicago where I managed a gallery for a time. When I was young my family lived in the Seattle area so I feel I can claim that I am truly from the NW at heart! I have raised our daughter here in this home. I wish to welcome the woman traveler....I am one too and I love to hear about the people, places and pathways in the world out there. There so are many to see...

Please visit my websites to see my artwork and learn more about my life here on the west coast. I look forward to meeting you in person!!
(URL HIDDEN)   drawings in mixed media, paintings in ink & oils.
(URL HIDDEN)    French Pictorial tapestry, Labyrinth designs, classes.

THE LANGUAGE OF ART CONNECTS US ACROSS BORDERS & OCEANS

name: Dustin
about: I have pretty much lived in the Portland-Vancouver area my whole life, I have an English Springer she's 13 and she's not quite all that active anymore, she has had a great life and done many different activities. Sadly she has passed recently (09/04/2002 - 11/19/2015) Love you Hailey! If you should have any questions Please feel free to ask me. Thank you again for your interest or your booking at our Airbnb unit.

name: Pualana
about:
“Live Simply – Grow – Honor Relationships – Celebrate.”

I'm just a girl who loves adventures and living stylishly on a budget. An avid traveler, and social butterfly who also loves to play host. It's likely I'll be away when you stay with me, but I am always easy to get a hold of and fast to act on any issues. Always looking for new adventures and great people to connect with.

Everything will be alright in the end. And it's not alright, then it's not yet the end.

name: Lee
about: I'm a pretty relaxed guy. Into video games, art, reading, movies, and music. Been in Portland a couple years, if you need tips on where to go here feel free to ask!

name: Ian
about: I love living in Portland and it makes me happy to share my home with visitors of this town!  A 30-something professional male, I've been living in Portland for the last 12 years, and moved into this perfectly place house last summer .  Professionally I'm manage remote sensing and mapping projects for a company here in town.  Out hiking in Oregon's forests and cooking are things I like to do.  I like to travel for long weekends and extended periods.  I'm looking to extend the hospitality I hope to receive on my trips!

name: Mike
about:
I'm a stay-at-home dad to two awesome little boys after selling my tech consulting business.  I'm not sure which job is harder. :)

I've traveled North America and Europe extensively and stayed everywhere in between the bug infested motels in Fargo and five star resorts in Monaco. I love fly fishing, hiking, running, camping, beer, wine, whiskey along with a plethora of other distractions. The pacific northwest and Portland is the perfect place to satiate just about everything.  Except scuba diving. The water is just to cold for me and I don't like dry suits. :)

My home on Airbnb is another distraction and passion that allows me to draw on all my travel experience to decorate and host guests the way I loved while traveling.  It's the little things and the details I like to focus on.  From the plush towels, easy electronic lock access, TVs in every room, couches you sink into to the kids games I've stocked. I want people to fall in love with the place and region and have an opportunity to not just stay in another clean and comfortable place, but be surrounded by art, magazines, artifacts from the area that immerse you in the sense of place during your stay.

name: Juliana
about: Musicologist, foodie, nature lover. New mama.

name: Robert
about: I am an easy going guy with plenty of space to share. I work from home so I am usually around to help with anything that you may need.

name: Glynis
about:
I'm an Oregonian that originated out of Fiji many moons ago and absolutely love it here as this is really the only home I've known since I was so young when my family moved to the great NW.  I appreciate the little things in life and try to live as simply as I can without giving up essential luxuries; Wine, good food (preferably mama's butter chicken), great coffee, a good book, great conversation, comfy bootie slippers etc.  
I do enjoy the great outdoors and all that summer has to bring here to this beautiful city.  I'm excited to travel and am ready to do much more exploring in the near future and with Airbnb think it will be that much more of an adventure in my endeavor for learning about the culture and people of the places I will be visiting be it Minnesota or Croatia.  
I love a good road trip as it brings a whole new realm of discovering not just the amazing landscapes, quirky little towns, and awesome hole in the wall burger joints but discovering more about yourself and the amount of patience you have in such a closed off space with your travel buddy ;)  
All in all, I'm a pretty laid back person, who loves to meet new people, I love being in social settings and also enjoy down time.  I try to maintain a good balance in life, I'm a big advocate against Mountains out of Mole Hill syndrome...I usually try to steer clear of that.  
So that's me in a nutshell :)

name: Monika
about: Jewelry designer from Portland, Oregon

name: Eric
about: I'm a physical therapist, currently a stay-at-home Dad and community organizer living in Portland, Oregon.

name: Kimberly
about: I am a 33 year old graphic designer currently working in Manhattan. I'm originally from the West Coast of Canada and have been in New York for 3.5 years. I work a lot but in my off time I'm either at the ceramics studio, going to music and art shows or getting upstate whenever possible. I have done lots of traveling (Europe, Asia, Australia etc.) in my life and know what it's like to have a comfortable place to stay when you're on the road. I'm real laid-back and friendly and will do my best to supply advice about New York! Hope to see you soon!

name: Andre
about: My name is Andre I live in Portland. I like to travel and see new places.  I like to run and cycle. I have done a several century rides and run a couple marathons.

name: Darcy
about: Hi, I'm Darcy! Growing up in Oregon, I have always been drawn to adventure travel in the mountains and ocean. I love traveling, meeting new people, and integrating myself in various communities. Surfing, hiking, coffee, wine, summer, puppies, and cheese are a few of my favorite things.

name: Josh
about: United States, Portland Oregon.  Married, 3.5 year old daughter, 1.5 year old son camping, road biking, white water kayaking, backpacking.  Engineer at medical company.

name: Ray
about: Senior married for decades, we like to garden, go to happy hrs, have nice dinners out, listen to music, travel by car, build art projects, visit with other people and family, I love working on old cars! My wife is a decorator, she will make sure your quarters are intimate, clean and free of all odors, you will be pleased!

name: Schuyler And Corrine
about: We're two married high school teachers who love to getaway for travel whenever we have breaks! On weekends, Schuyler likes to homebrew beer (and it is frequently on tap in the house) while Corrine likes to sleep in on our comfy California King bed and walk to any of the great businesses on N Williams Ave and N Mississippi Ave.

name: Adam
about:
Hi, I'm Adam.  I'm an explorer - I've spent the last few years traveling the world and guiding other people who are also wandering.  In the last two years, I helped lead an excursion to the North Pole, I rode a motorcycle across Laos, Cambodia, and Vietnam, and most recently, I've been looking for a place to settle in the US.   

After a long stint in Chicago, I'm currently living in Portland.  The relaxed vibe of the city (and the incredible food) makes it a comfortable place to call home.  I'm a laid back host - I'm happy to recommend places to check out or grab a beer, but it's really up to my guests how much they want to see me.   

I like coffee, access to large bodies of water, Elon Musk, and the color green.

name: Alexandra
about:
Hello! 

I am new to Airbnb. I have friends that use the service, and they recommended it to me.

I'm a 32 y.o. lady from Portland, OR, but currently am staying in rural Illinois. I'm looking for a place to stay in Chicago from April 7th - May 7th (or somewhere around those dates). I have a super awesome, well-mannered black lab with me. He's 10ish years old and medium in size. We are a package deal. 

I'm a very clean, responsible, and respectful person. I will take good care of your place! I can provide a rental reference from the homeowner I currently rent from in Portland. I've lived peacefully with about a gazillion different people over the years, so if you have a roommate I'm sure we will be able to get along fine. I have a lot of online classes this semester, so I will mostly just be sitting around the apartment doing computer work. 

If you are interested in some more personal details:
I'm a full time student at Portland State University, studying Public Health and Community Development. I work as a massage therapist. In my free time 
I love to garden, travel, learn, camp, bike, cook, and hang with my dog pal.

name: Devan
about:
An enthusiast for cooking, traveling, art and design.

I travel for long periods of time so in light of that I try to make the most out of my time wherever that may be.

name: Noel
about: I'm from Half Moon Bay, CA. I live in Portland, OR.

name: Kimberly
about:
When I'm not working my long hours at the hospital, I'm using my long weekends to travel around the US and abroad.  I spent the last few years living in New England, and survived a wicked winter, a humid summer, and a lot of beautiful in between. I'm happy to be back home in the Pacific Northwest with the big mountains and the moderate climate. 

 I love to ride my bicycle.

name: Shelly
about: Mother of 3, Wife of 1

name: Ben
about: Welcome!

name: David, Soledad
about: I'm casual guy but conservative at the same time. I like to keep thing simple and clean. My home is open for my friends, guests and adventures, please enjoy! just make sure that every thing looks good before you leave.

name: Jarrett
about: We live in the neighborhood and can head over shortly to make sure everything is ready for you!

name: Tim
about: We are a professional working family in Portland, Oregon who loves to travel and host. Our home is a sociable and comfortable space filled with lots of light, cookbooks, and good memories.

name: Amber
about: I live in Portland, Oregon with my husband and our two young girls. We were both raised in the Pacific Northwest and our love for it runs deep. We love sharing this beautiful part of the world with others, especially our guests! We enjoy traveling, eating out at new restaurants and old favorites in our reputable, foodie city,  as well as exploring nature, and searching for/making that perfect manhattan.

name: Carlos
about:
A quiet creative, a lively explorer, and a wolfen scent aficionado live in the studio behind the house we host. For the moment it's just me (Carlos) and the panter (Sola), but you will see a lot of Ines in the old tomes, embracing nooks, and thoughtful wanderlust that defines the space.

I am content cave painting for long stretches but I come out when for the farther side of culture that courses through town. I have my haunts and events, and I've lived here long enough that I can recommend something for everyone. I am around, so if it's clear out there may be fire and whiskey, and if I am headed out somewhere there's a good chance you're invited. That place might be the Doug Fir (best small music venue), Helium (best comedy club), or Church of Film (best never-ending film festival) for example.

Sola, for her part, enjoys copious, unbroken attention and long walks on the planet. She is very friendly but-- and don't repeat this-- she can be kind of narcissistic and contrarian at times. You know, more of a talker than a listener. That said, she is one of my favorite people and the only person I know who sheds more than I do.

name: Lisa
about: I am a native Oregonian. Born and raised in Coos Bay, and have lived in the Portland Metro area since 1985, spending the last 20 years in the Moreland-Sellwood neighborhood. I live, work and play in my excellent neighborhood!

name: Christopher And Ngone
about: We are a family of five who recently relocated to Portland from Alaska. Welcome!

name: Tamara
about: I am an avid traveler and adventurer. I teach yoga and Pilates and love bike riding. Travelling has allowed me to build relationships with people all over the world and explore this wonderful place and all its cultures. I love to write and am a published author. The thing I try to remember is to Live, Love, Laugh..

name: Steve
about: I love playgrounds, boating, grandkids, glasswork, history and my great neighborhood in NE Portland.

name: Diana
about:
Welcome!
I am an architect who has lived in Portland for 25 years. I love this city and have enjoyed seeing it grow into the creative destination it is known for today. There is a sense of community here that is fostered by all of the small local businesses and restaurants. The best way to experience the city is to walk the small commercial districts and my house is in the center of several. I'm also the mother of two wonderful teen boys and share my large house with a very quiet roommate. Besides architecture my interests include cooking, gardening, reading, and exploring the beautiful landscapes of the Pacific Northwest.

name: Leah
about: I am originally from California, but I have lived all over the states from Indiana to Maryland to New York City. I love my new home in Portland because the city is so much fun, the people are friendly and the surrounding nature is absolutely breathtaking!

name: Robert
about: Local Portlander who lived in this area where I attended both Grant High School and Lewis and Clark College.  Our family is nearby, and we are here to insure your trip to our home is enjoyable!

name: Patricia
about: I am a well-traveled, outdoorsy professional woman. I've lived in Ireland, Indonesia, Cameroon, Cambridge, Ohio, Maine, and throughout urban and rural Oregon.

name: Dj
about: I love helping others and sharing my home on airbnb.

name: Dar
about: We are both native Portlanders and recent empty nesters ready to share our home with you.  We are big time tennis addicts and if you play, we have extra rackets/balls and a park close-by with courts!   We are pretty laid back and would be open to sharing a meal with you if you would like. :)  We love walks and our neighborhood is perfect for that.  Hope to see you!

name: Emily + Sean
about: Just a couple Oregonians trying to make it in the crazy world. Love living in Portland with our adorable son and hope to have other people enjoy our happy home while we try and galavant across the world when we can.

name: Jennie
about:
I'm a fitness instructor and Metalsmith. I'm currently attending Marylhurst University to attain my Masters in Art Therapy. I'm laid back and can't wait to meet you :) 
I have a lab/retriever that is as sweet as they get.

name: The Reed Family
about: Hello. My name is Julian and I live in a charming 3 bedroom 2.5 bath home with my wife, Miranda, and our 4 year old twins. All of the bedrooms are on the 2nd floor. My wife and I sleep in the master bedroom, while the twins have their own room. We have a guest bedroom available for up to 2 people. The room comes with a queen size  mattress and frame to accommodate 2 guests and an empty closet for storage space.

name: Amy
about: My Name is Amy and I'm a native Oregonian living with my husband and 3 sons in Portland.  We enjoy traveling, good food, friends and sports.
